thread.title: Global Stocks Rebound Ahead of Fed Release

author: Kenan Machado
title: Global Stocks Rebound Ahead of Fed Release

organizations.name: global stocks rebound ahead of fed release global

text:
Fed rate announcement, guidance in focus Bond yields climb Energy and materials sectors rise U.S. stocks inched higher Wednesday, lifted by a rise in commodity prices amid cautious trading leading up to the Federal Reserveâ€™s interest-rate decision.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average added 117 points, or 0.2%, to 24845. The S&P 500 climbed 0.4%, while the Nasdaq Composite added 0.3%. All three indexes swung between small gains and losses for the second straight session following sharp declines to start the week.
